source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a large, brightly lit Ferris wheel at night. The wheel is adorned with yellow and red lights, creating a mesmerizing, symmetrical pattern against the dark sky. The shot captures the wheel in motion from a head-on perspective.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of a large, brightly lit Ferris wheel at night. The wheel is adorned with yellow and red lights, creating a mesmerizing, symmetrical pattern against the dark sky. The shot captures the wheel in motion from a head-on perspective.

generated_critique: The video shows several people walking around the base of the Ferris wheel as it rotates.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video captures a large, brightly lit Ferris wheel at night, adorned with yellow and red lights that create a mesmerizing, symmetrical pattern against the dark sky. Several people can be seen walking around the base of the Ferris wheel as it rotates, adding a lively atmosphere to the scene. The shot is taken from a head-on perspective, highlighting the wheel's motion.
